trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when authentication fails for an authentication stream and cannot be retried.
The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> class throws this exception when authentication fails.
This exception indicates that the underlying stream isn't in a valid state and that you can't retry the authentication using the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> instance.
If you retry the authentication, an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> is thrown instead of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class with no message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class with the specified message.
This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the authentication failure.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> classes.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to deserialize the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter and initializes the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property with the `innerException` parameter value.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the authentication failure.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that is the cause of the current exception.
